articles.title: US commerce chief warns against China ‘threat’ - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Gina Raimondo urged lawmakers, Silicon Valley and US allies to stop the Asian superpower from accessing advanced chips and other top technologies.
articles.content:
US Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo on Saturday urged lawmakers, Silicon Valley and US allies to stop China from getting semiconductors and cutting-edge technologies key to national security.
Speaki… [+2022 chars]
